frontMatter.title: Why does Windows64 use a different calling convention from all other OSes on x86-64?
frontMatter.summary: Why does Windows64 use a different calling convention from all other OSes on x86-64?

prev.title: 黑暗网站
prev.summary: 黑暗网站（英語：Dark web）多简称为暗网，是存在于黑暗网络、覆盖网络上的万维网内容，只能用特殊軟體、特殊授權、或對電腦做特殊設定才能访问。

next.title: How Important are Algorithms and Data Structures in Backend Engineering?
next.summary: Algorithms & Data Structures are critical to Backend Engineering however it really depends on what kind of application and infrastructure you are building.
